mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO, ID, NICKNAME, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY_DATE, REVIEW_HIT, REVIEW_STAR, PROFILE_IMAGE FROM REVIEW_BRD ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_BRD (CAMP_NO, ID, NICKNAME, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY_DATE, REVIEW_IP, REVIEW_HIT, PROFILE_IMAGE) VALUES (#{campNo}, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewStar}, #{reviewContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), #{reviewIp}, 0, #{profileImage})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_BRD SET REVIEW_TITLE = #{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, REVIEW_MODIFY_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
